title: X-Metaverse
author: X-Metaverse
content: On September 8, 2022, X-Metaverse completed the second round of XMETA token burning under the Token burning plan, it is a total of 385,423.4 XMETA is burned. The total current token supply is 877,562,791.6 XMETA. The details of the burning are as follows.ðŸ”¥X-Metaverse in-game spendingXMETA burning amount: 68,815.4Transaction hash.https://bscscan.com/tx/0x63fc0a726d3fd7249e80fbff48f098041e96badf6e82ae617ed26251a825b63bðŸ”¥V2 market transaction fee (energy core, black box)XMETA burning amount: 37,458Transaction hash.https://bscscan.com/tx/0xd86b9f9b9b3c42653b3782134b2c79837022ae8bd5b1e0fec9d949368297fb0aðŸ”¥Space Battleship Retrofitting:XMETA burning amount: 279,150Transaction hash.https://bscscan.com/tx/0xa8f1bcd9963335aa09b5a18a4be505010ea6567d13ec8382727da5c70550bc6bðŸ”¥V2 market transaction fee (NFT BOX, Space Battleship, Pilot)The token burning part of V2 market transaction fee totaling 83,151.5 XMETA, it will be postponed to the next round of token burning.ðŸ‘› XMETA total supplyBefore burning.Total supply: 900,000,000 XMETAFirst burn: 22,051,785 XMETASecond burn: 385,423.40 XMETAAfter burning.Total supply: 877,562,791.60 XMETAAbout X-MetaverseX-Metaverse is a blockchain 3D game that runs on Android, IOS and PC. All game contents and characters are based on Blockchain tokens and NFTs. X-Metaverseâ€™s visuals and gameplay are inspired by Starcraft and Star Wars. Players will be immersed in the vast expanse of space, spending time cultivating different races, Upgrading ships, reaching more galaxies and collecting rare materials. The most exciting part is that you can earn cryptocurrency with other players through actions such as conquest, exploration, competition, mining, production, breeding and combat.Follow us on social media and be the first to get the news!Websiteï¼šhttps://www.x-metaverse.org/Twitterï¼šhttps://twitter.com/XMetaverse_Discordï¼šhttp://discord.gg/x-metaverseMediumï¼šhttps://medium.com/@X-MetaverseYouTubeï¼šhttps://www.youtube.com/c/XMetaverseTelegramï¼šhttps://t.me/XMetaverse_officialTelegram Channelï¼šhttps://t.me/XMetaverse_Channel
